summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 31st Avenue South from Graham Street to Raymond Street; and certain other streets and avenues by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16570 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
